9299.quoteText: Your personal information is retained for as long as it is necessary in order to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, to enforce applicable Terms of Service, or to comply with our legal obligations
9299.title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

tosdr.case: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

9300.quoteText:
There are, however, cases where we are not allowed to delete your data in its entirety as a result of legal retention periods.
We may also decline requests if they risk the privacy of others, would be extremely impractical, or for which access is not required by law
9300.title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations

tosdr.case: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations

9301.quoteText:
You are entitled to request information about the personal data stored by us, to have incorrect data corrected, or to request the freezing or deletion of your data.
For example, you can request the deletion of your account and its associated email address and content by going into the settings in any of our applications.
You are also entitled to the portability of your personal data.
Further, you may object to the use of your data at any time with effect for the future
9301.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data

9302.quoteText: Should you choose to delete your account, please contact us at support@taskade.com and we will follow up with such request as soon as possible
9302.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time

9303.quoteText: If Taskade is involved in a reorganization, merger, or sale, the information we collect may be transferred as part of that transaction
9303.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

tosdr.case: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

9304.quoteText:
Minors and children should not use Taskade.
By using the Website, you represent that you have the legal capacity to enter into a binding agreement
9304.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age

9306.quoteText: You can block or delete cookies and still be able to use Taskade, although if you do you will then be asked for your username and password every time you log in to the Website
9306.title: Tracking cookies refused will not limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Tracking cookies refused will not limit your ability to use the service

9307.quoteText: Our website, services, apps, email communications and advertisements may use “cookies
9307.title: This service requires first-party cookies

9308.quoteText: and other technologies such as “pixel tags” and “click-through URLs
9308.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

9309.quoteText: You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but please note that certain features on our website may not be available as a result

12177.quoteText: We reserve the right to, but do not have any obligation to, (i) remove, edit or modify any Content in our sole discretion, at any time, without notice to you and for any reason (including, but not limited to, upon receipt of claims or allegations from third parties or authorities relating to such Content or if we are concerned that you may have violated these Terms of Service), or for no reason at all and (ii) to remove or block any Content from the Website.

12178.quoteText:
Waiver and Severability

Our failure to exercise or enforce any right or provision of the Terms of Service shall not constitute a waiver of such right or provision.

12179.quoteText: If any provision of these Terms of Service is held by a court of competent jurisdiction to be invalid, illegal or unenforceable for any reason, such provision shall be eliminated or limited to the minimum extent such that the remaining provisions of the Terms of Service will continue in full force and effect.
